casebody.data:
Stanley FOOTE
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided March 15, 2017

Jodi Zils Gagne, in support of the petition.

Matthew A. Weiner, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Stanley Foote's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 170 Conn. App. 747, 155 A.3d 823 (2017), is denied.
